channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-2.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: Castle ruins are a local cat's favorite spot for a stroll, though he somehow gets a stick caught in his collar. Meanwhile, a cat and dog living in a bookstore go to sleep as soon as the store opens.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: Savor Nagasaki's long-loved noodle dish "Champon"! This bowl had a surprising impact on ramen's history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: asking for instant guidance. Makni Mohamed, from Tunisia, works as a construction site guard. He sometimes struggles to get the foreman's attention. To improve, he tackles a roleplay challenge.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Okinawa: Us Influences
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Hayashiya Tsuruko is breaking new ground by reinterpreting the Japanese art of classic rakugo comic storytelling from a woman's perspective. She talks about her message for modern audiences.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #8 Onomatopoeia/ We'll look at some examples of onomatopoeia, the imitation of sounds in words. The Japanese language is rich with such words.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Okinawa: Shuri Castle
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Shuri Castle.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to bow and arrow. Explore the unique culture behind them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Is there a meal you'll never forget? People with international roots living in Japan take you on a tasty exploration of the dishes that brought timely emotional support in their lives.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We visit two cafes that offer flavors from their chefs' homeland - one in Minoh, Osaka, run by Choi Sungja from South Korea, and the other in Hida Takayama, Gifu, managed by Taiwanese Lin Chiayu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #48 When I graduate, I want to work in Japan. / To explain your plan, say a verb in the "ta" form followed by "ra," to indicate the circumstance, and then whatever your plan is.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN holds regular disaster mitigation seminars for international students, providing the knowledge that foreign residents need to stay safe. We introduce a seminar at Kanazawa University.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 21, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #8 Onomatopoeia/ We'll look at some examples of onomatopoeia, the imitation of sounds in words. The Japanese language is rich with such words.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: World-class stuntman Obikane Nobuyuki won an Emmy Award for his work on the hit historical TV drama series "Shogun." He talks about his techniques for achieving realistic, thrilling action.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Bedtime Routine
channel.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Nasal congestion could be a sign of sinusitis, which may lead to ear infections or even blindness. Japan's top nasal surgery hospital uses advanced equipment to perform sinus surgeries safely.

channel.title: Where We Call Home

channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN holds regular disaster mitigation seminars for international students, providing the knowledge that foreign residents need to stay safe. We introduce a seminar at Kanazawa University.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Tokyo's Arakawa Ward has a shopping street with over 100 years of history. There sits a piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 30 Japanese suffer from mental illness. We follow a woman who finds it hard to do simple tasks due to her illness, as she goes to rehabilitation for returning to work.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Photographer Alfie Goodrich heads to Yakushima, a mystical island of ancient Yakusugi trees. He traces the steps of a famous British plant-hunter and meets stewards of the land.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Experience the fascinating sights of the airports and transport hubs which connect Japan with the world. Time-lapse photography will show you how these places bustle with activity around the clock.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Beware! False Info And Impression
channel.desc: After a major earthquake hits, the father posts a video online spreading a rumor that the quake was "man-made." Of course, this earns a scolding from his daughter, but like always, not much changes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A 24-hour gas station with prices that entice drivers from both near and far. From a couple who travels and sleeps in their car to a professional driver, join us as we listen to customers' stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: On New Year's Eve, performers dress as monsters called namahage. It's a good-natured tradition that strengthens family and community bonds. And in the village of Tayazawa, it was recently revived.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Hokkaido / Takeya Takayuki (model maker) Fishing boats in the herring industry-which thrived here until the 1950s-featured swirling decorations that made a big impression on Takeya, a Hokkaido native.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A 24-hour gas station with prices that entice drivers from both near and far. From a couple who travels and sleeps in their car to a professional driver, join us as we listen to customers' stories.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Shibuya is one of Tokyo's largest cities. A piano is placed near a ticket gate at the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Photographer Alfie Goodrich heads to Yakushima, a mystical island of ancient Yakusugi trees. He traces the steps of a famous British plant-hunter and meets stewards of the land.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony #1 Spring
channel.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Through research on the calls of the Japanese tit, Suzuki Toshitaka has proven that animals other than humans have language capabilities. He talks about pioneering the field of animal linguistics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Good Or Evil Soul
channel.desc: We visit the Yoshiwara district, Edo's most prominent pleasure quarters. Among the lavish spenders, courtesans and apprentices, small humanoid creatures scurry about - what could they be up to.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
channel.desc: In this episode, we learn about the spring dates of seimei and kokuu. The temple chefs show us how to make two seasonal specialties, yomogi rice cakes and bamboo shoots mixed with sansho leaves.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Traditional techniques and resourceful recipes! Chefs Saito and Rika, present their unique approaches to cooking delicious Japanese food.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Kumamoto is recovering from the 2016 earthquake. A piano is placed in a shopping arcade for a limited period, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: This episode looks at Japan's leading shipping innovations, such as the world's first electric tanker and fuel-saving "air lubrication." Also, out-of-body illusions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Photographer Alfie Goodrich heads to Yakushima, a mystical island of ancient Yakusugi trees. He traces the steps of a famous British plant-hunter and meets stewards of the land.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: My Street Piano
channel.desc: Hirosaki City in Aomori Prefecture is known for its Western architecture. A piano is placed inside the station, and people stop to play from their heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Amami: Biodiversity
channel.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World

channel.desc: The nuns of Otowasan Kannonji Temple teach us how to make shinoda rolls with taro stalks, a simple fall dish suitable for festive occasions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Yamamoto Riken won the 2024 Pritzker Prize, architecture's highest honor. For decades he has tried to use architecture to revitalize communities. Hear his vision for society and the spaces we build.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Secret Date
channel.desc: It's late at night, when all are fast asleep. A young man and woman huddle together along the veranda outside of a house, attending to a ... rooster. What could the pair be up to.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Noguchi Tomohisa makes leather from discarded fish skin. We investigate his efforts to utilize waste in the seafood industry, and contribute to sustainability.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
channel.desc: "Trails to Oishii Tokyo" is a show that focuses on Japanese food available at Tokyo's food market where every kind of fresh food is gathered from around the country.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: Ryogoku is known as the home of sumo. As we explore, we learn how the sport took root after a devastating fire in the 17th century. It turns out that the neighborhood has a history of bouncing back.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kurosaki Yu is a blacksmith specializing in Echizen cutlery, a 700-year-old Japanese craft. His knives are sought after by chefs in Japan and overseas. He talks about achieving ultimate sharpness.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.
